languages.text: {n}Словно игнорируя слова Серого Вортена, Каллигос показательно кривится.{/n} "Да вы с Чордой никак спелись за моей спиной? Решили довести старика до могилы занудством да проповедями?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Словно игнорируя слова Серого Вортена, Каллигос показательно кривится.{/n} "Да вы с Чордой никак спелись за моей спиной? Решили довести старика до могилы занудством да проповедями?"

languages.text: {n}Not paying any heed to what Worten just said, Calligos grimaces in disdain.{/n} "Did you and Chorda bond behind my back? Is this a plot to bore an old man to death with your incessant preaching?"
languages.original_text: {n}Словно игнорируя слова Серого Вортена, Каллигос показательно кривится.{/n} "Да вы с Чордой никак спелись за моей спиной? Решили довести старика до могилы занудством да проповедями?"

traits.locale_text: {n}As if not paying any heed to the words of Worten the Grey, Calligos grimaces in disdain.{/n} "Did you and Chorda bond over behind my back? Do you plan to bore this man to death with your incessant preaching?"

{n}As if not paying any heed to the words of Worten the Grey, Calligos grimaces in disdain.{/n} "Did you and Chorda bond over behind my back? Do you plan to bore this man to death with your incessant preaching?"

{n}As if not paying any heed to the words of Worten the Grey, Calligos grimaces in disdain.{/n} "Did you and Chorda bond over behind my back? Do you plan to bore this man to death with your incessant preaching?"

{n}Not paying any heed to what Worten just said, Calligos grimaces in disdain.{/n} "Did you and Chorda bond behind my back? Is this a plot to bore an old man to death with your incessant preaching?"
{n}Not paying any heed to what Worten just said, Calligos grimaces in disdain.{/n} "Did you and Chorda bond behind my back? Is this a plot to bore an old man to death with your incessant preaching?"

languages.text: {n}Calligos hace una mueca de desdén, ignorando lo que Worten acaba de decir.{/n} «¿Es que Chorda y usted han congeniado a mis espaldas? ¿Planean matar a este anciano de aburrimiento con sus incesantes sermones?».
languages.original_text: {n}Not paying any heed to what Worten just said, Calligos grimaces in disdain.{/n} "Did you and Chorda bond behind my back? Is this a plot to bore an old man to death with your incessant preaching?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos hace una mueca de desdén, como ignorando las palabras de Worten el Gris.{/n} «¿Es que Chorda y usted han congeniado a mis espaldas? ¿Planean matarme de aburrimiento con sus incesantes sermoneos?».

languages.text: {n}卡里戈斯根本没有留意灰斑沃尔腾刚刚说的话，他轻蔑地瞪着你。{/n}“你是不是背地里和库尔达搅在了一起？你是打算靠没完没了的讲道，把我这把老骨头活活烦死吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Not paying any heed to what Worten just said, Calligos grimaces in disdain.{/n} "Did you and Chorda bond behind my back? Is this a plot to bore an old man to death with your incessant preaching?"

traits.locale_text: {n}卡里戈斯似乎根本没有留意灰斑沃尔腾的话，他轻蔑地瞪着你。{/n}“你是不是背地里和库尔达搅在了一起？你是打算靠没完没了的讲道，把我烦死吗？”

languages.text: {n}Ne prêtant aucune attention aux paroles de Worten, Calligos grimace de dédain.{/n} « Vous vous êtes {mf|acoquiné|acoquinée} avec Chorda dans mon dos, c'est ça ? Vous comptez me faire mourir d'ennui avec vos prêches incessants ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Not paying any heed to what Worten just said, Calligos grimaces in disdain.{/n} "Did you and Chorda bond behind my back? Is this a plot to bore an old man to death with your incessant preaching?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Comme s'il ne prêtait aucune attention aux paroles de Worten le Gris, Calligos grimace de dédain.{/n} « Vous vous êtes {mf|acoquiné|acoquinée} avec Chorda dans mon dos, c'est ça ? Vous voulez me faire mourir d'ennui avec vos prêches incessants ? »

languages.text: {n}ヴォルテン・ザ・グレイの言葉など意に介さないかのように、カリゴスは軽蔑の表情を浮かべる。 {/n}「お前は俺に気付かれぬようにチョーダと手を結んだのか？この男を死ぬまで退屈させて説教を続けるつもりか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Not paying any heed to what Worten just said, Calligos grimaces in disdain.{/n} "Did you and Chorda bond behind my back? Is this a plot to bore an old man to death with your incessant preaching?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォルテン・ザ・グレイの言葉など意に介さないかのように、カリゴスは軽蔑の表情を浮かべる。 {/n}「お前は俺に気付かれぬようにチョーダと手を結んだのか？この男を死ぬまで退屈させて説教を続けるつもりか？」

languages.text: {n}Calligos ignoriert, was Worten gesagt hat, und verzieht angewidert das Gesicht.{/n} "Habt Ihr Euch hinter meinem Rücken mit Chorda verbündet? Wollt Ihr einen alten Mann mit Eurem unaufhörlichen Gerede zu Tode langweilen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Not paying any heed to what Worten just said, Calligos grimaces in disdain.{/n} "Did you and Chorda bond behind my back? Is this a plot to bore an old man to death with your incessant preaching?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Als würde er gar nicht auf die Worte von Worten dem Grauen achten, verzieht Calligos angewidert das Gesicht.{/n} "Habt Ihr Euch hinter meinem Rücken mit Chorda verbündet? Wollt Ihr diesen Mann mit Eurem unaufhörlichen Gerede zu Tode langweilen?"

languages.text: {n}Worten'ın az önce söylediklerine hiç aldırış etmeyen Calligos, kibirle yüzünü ekşitiyor.{/n} "Chorda'yla arkamdan iş mi çevirdiniz? Ardı arkası kesilmeyen vaazlarınla yaşlı bir adamı sıkıntıdan öldürmek için kurduğun bir komplo mu bu?"
languages.original_text: {n}Not paying any heed to what Worten just said, Calligos grimaces in disdain.{/n} "Did you and Chorda bond behind my back? Is this a plot to bore an old man to death with your incessant preaching?"
